price: Te he facilitado [el Corán] revelándotelo [oh, Mujámmad] en tu idioma para que albricies con él a los piadosos y adviertas a tus enemigos.
arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرۡنَٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمٗا لُّدّٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-innamā yassarnāhu bilisānika litubashira bihi al-mutaqīna watundhira bihi qawman luddan
translations: that you may give glad tidings
